name: Robot Fighting: Boss Street Bo
description:
Robot Fighting: Boss Street Boxing is the immortal superhero champions fight you will fight as the superhero city street crime fighter to experience the attack and action games. It’s about futuristic war games where you are going to experience best boxing skills for example kung Fu, martial arts and karate in fighting ring arena.
Features:

• Challenge to opponent transformer to fight
• Multiple transformer robot players to choose
• Real 3d graphics and amazing kung Fu games environment
• Smooth and addictive robot fighting screen controls
